name: Dice Rollvolution
description:
Too many hours have been spent by us being thrown, mistreated and hurt only to view the pearly shine of our six faces. Today, my friends, WE START A  ROLLVOLUTION!!!

In this game, you control a six faced dice, each face with a different way to defeat the traitor board game pieces.

Controls:

Control the dice with W,A,S,D;

Point your weapon with your Mouse;

Use Mouse Button 1 to attack.

Credits:

Art Management/Assets, Moral Support: Gonçalo Oliveira

Programming, Animations, and Motivation/Sanity Restorer: Tomás Ribeiro

Programming, Balancing, Story and Moral Destroyer: Isabel Rodrigues

Cooking to keep the team alive: Chef Mike (a.k.a. Microwave)

Distraction during development: Beetle 1 and Beetle 2 (R.I.P. Beetle 1)
